input.content:
Convert the following text into English. Text:
```
¿Por qué malgastar el tiempo buscando las llaves?
```

src_txt: ¿Por qué malgastar el tiempo buscando las llaves?
trg_txt: Why waste your time looking for the keys?

input.content: Translate this into English: Ihm wurden das Konservatorium und das Theater gewidmet, in dem jedes Jahr das „Rossini Opera Festival“ stattfindet, das Opernliebhaber aus aller Welt anlockt.

src_txt: Ihm wurden das Konservatorium und das Theater gewidmet, in dem jedes Jahr das „Rossini Opera Festival“ stattfindet, das Opernliebhaber aus aller Welt anlockt.
trg_txt: Every year, the conservatory and theatre, both named after him, host the Rossini Opera Festival, drawing enthusiasts from around the world.

input.content:
Convert the following text into French. Text:
```
All questions have been correctly answered by the treasurer Thomas Kräuchi.
```

src_txt: All questions have been correctly answered by the treasurer Thomas Kräuchi.
trg_txt: Le trésorier Thomas Kräuchi a répondu correctement à toutes les questions.

input.content:
Convert the following text into Japanese. Text:
```
The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
```

src_txt: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
trg_txt: 次の写真は、原子が光子を放出している様子です。もちろん、実際には写真よりもはるかに微小です。

input.content: Translate the following text from Simplified Chinese to English: 比赛是在草地上进行的，洞周围的草被修剪得更短，被称为果岭。

src_txt: 比赛是在草地上进行的，洞周围的草被修剪得更短，被称为果岭。
trg_txt: The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
